response: The Tate brothers, Andrew and Tristan, have been involved in a number of criminal and civil legal affairs stemming from their joint business and personal activities. As of March 2025, the brothers are facing six legal investigationsfour criminal and two civilin Romania, the United Kingdom, and Florida. In response, they filed two lawsuits against their accusers in the United States. Andrew also faces an additional civil case in the United Kingdom. The brothers have denied all charges and alleg
